trans-unit.source: Represents child controls of containers that support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示子控件的容器的支持<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Controls that support GridItemPattern can typically be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 支持 GridItemPattern 控件通常可以进行遍历 （即，UI 自动化客户端可以移动到相邻控件） 通过使用键盘。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取此缓存的属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的属性的当前值，通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Current%2A>获取属性

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的属性值中。

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.Column*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.Column*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.Column*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ColumnSpan*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ColumnSpan*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ColumnSpan*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ContainingGrid*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ContainingGrid*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.ContainingGrid*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前的属性值此<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: 此模式必须从<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>与<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>以获取当前值的引用。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>获得使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Cached%2A>若要获取的缓存的值指定的属性，这是以前使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: 当前的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern"></xref>控件模式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 模式标识符传递给方法，例如，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>若要检索从指定的<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>感兴趣的控件模式</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.Row*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.Row*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.Row*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.RowSpan*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.RowSpan*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern.GridItemPatternInformation.RowSpan*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段
